casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Michael Paul LOWRY. No. 39P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2005. Richard E. Jester, for Michael Paul Lowry. R. Kirk Randleman, Assistant Attorney General, G. Dewey Hudson, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 18th day of January 2005 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th day of June 2005."
